sense.name: become free of or released from
sense.examples: It might be best to disengage the autopilot and fly manually. Meanwhile McCubby had disengaged himself from the melee. The bolts disengaged. It will be difficult for you to disengage unless you are challanged. The US can't afford to completely disengage from the Middle East. Rejected children also have a tendency to disengage social environments.
